tool_description: SPAMIP is a is a simple tool to check whether the given ip address is spam/blacklisted or not. The blacklisted IP addresses are collected from different sources and updated regularly.
name: SpamIP
title: SpamIP

api_list.name: Check whether the ip is blacklisted/spam
api_list.description: Check whether the ip is blacklisted/spam simply by url/blacklisted_ip/ip_address
